rows.label: qst711801_msg0001
rows.name: Nice of friends to show up!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0002
rows.name:
Gororo just think of new test me
want to put friends to.

rows.label: qst711801_msg0003
rows.name:
Last time, we do Break and Topple and
then call that good enough. Hopefully
friends remember?

rows.label: qst711801_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, is no longer good enough!
This time, we add Launch and Smash!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0005
rows.name:
Launch will lift enemy off ground,
and Smash will smash back down,
as name implies. Great power moves!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0006
rows.name:
Sequence of Break, Topple, Launch,
and finally Smash is ultimate form of
Driver Combo!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0007
rows.name:
For this test, Gororo want friends to
do whole whammy to any at all enemy,
anytime, anywhere, three times over.

rows.label: qst711801_msg0008
rows.name:
Next job is big! Huge! Enormous!
Gargantupon! Must be able to do
Driver Combo with eyes closed!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh, and of course must come to
Gororo to let know that test is done
once test is done. Or maybe is obvious?

rows.label: qst711801_msg0010
rows.name:
Well then, Gororo wait with
hopes held high!
